findings.title: The Merkle Proof check of the stake function can be bypassed
findings.description: Since the ‘leaf’ parameter of the _stake_ function is input from the outside, potential attackers can construct the correct leaf value to bypass the Merkle Proof check, and stake lots of fake NFTs to obtain income.

findings.title: Lacking protections against abnormal situations
findings.description: The smart contract lacks necessary protections against abnormal or unexpected situations, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Exception in the business logic of the stake method
findings.description: When the time of staking is a short time before the end of Pool, the user can still receive the rewards of Pool when unstake after the pool ends.

findings.title: Centralization risk
findings.description: The admin can call the _update_state_ function to set the ‘claim_required_balance’ to a maximum value, which will cause all users to be unable to withdraw rewards when calling the _claim_reward_ function.
